Plot: Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters and endeavor to build a village in order to protect themselves and about 1,000 Jewish non-combatants.
Title: Defiance
Writer: Clayton Frohman (screenplay), Edward Zwick (screenplay), Nechama Tec (book)
Actors: Daniel Craig, Liev Schreiber, Jamie Bell, Alexa Davalos
tomatoConsensus: Professionally made but artistically uninspired, Ed Zwick's story of Jews surviving WWII in the Belarus forest lacks the emotional punch of the actual history.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.
